content: [P1-1] Setup Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind, install dependencies, and configure Turso local dev
[P1-2] Define database schema (users, listings tables) and push to local Turso instance
[P2] Setup Better Auth with email OTP, create auth API routes, build login/signup UI
[P3] Build responsive homepage with hero, search bar, listings grid, sidebar placeholder, and footer
[P4] Create auth-protected listing detail pages with middleware and API endpoints
[P5] Build admin dashboard with CRUD operations for listings management
